double.name: dt
double.description: Size of energy update time step
double.label: dt

double.name: sigma_iter0
double.description: The weight of the image vs the regularization term for iteration 0
double.label: sigma_iter0

double.name: sigma_iter1
double.description: The weight of the image vs the regularization term for iteration 1
double.label: sigma_iter1

double.name: sigma_iter2
double.description: The weight of the image vs the regularization term for iteration 2
double.label: sigma_iter2

integer.name: nt
integer.description: Number of time discretization steps (per unit time)
integer.label: nt

integer.name: tTot
integer.description: Total amount of time to flow for
integer.label: tTot

double.name: alphadt
double.description: The factor by which to try adjusting the timestep while trying for a decrease each iteration
double.label: alphadt

integer.name: adjustFactor
integer.description: The factor by which to adjust the timestep when things are consistently going well or poorly from iteration to iteration
integer.label: adjustFactor

integer.name: adjustStepNum
integer.description: The number of constant good or bad steps required before adjusting the timestep
integer.label: adjustStepNum

integer.name: maxReducTries
integer.description: The number reduction attempst allowed each iteration while searching for a decrease during each iteration
integer.label: maxReducTries

integer.name: quitCheckFreq
integer.description: The frequency with which to check to make sure the energy has decreased overall. If it hasn't, the algorithm quits
integer.label: quitCheckFreq

boolean.name: flowMap
boolean.description: Flow using the map (true) or the image (false, default)
boolean.label: flowMap

boolean.name: verbose
boolean.description: Print status messages (true) or run silently (false, default)
boolean.label: verbose

boolean.name: useThreadedAdvection
boolean.description: Use the threaded version of the advection algorithm (true) or use the sequential version (false, default)
boolean.label: useThreadedAdvection

integer.name: numThreads
integer.description: The number of threads to use if using threaded advection
integer.label: numThreads

integer.name: iter0
integer.description: The number of iterations for the first run
integer.label: iter0

integer.name: iter1
integer.description: The number of iterations for the second run
integer.label: iter1

integer.name: iter2
integer.description: The number of iterations for the third run
integer.label: iter2
